website_summaries.verdict: An attractively priced, smooth-operating light switch that is easy to find in a dark room.
cons: A few reports of receiving damaged or non-operating switches and switch failure after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: ridiculous sticker right on decorative portion
customer_reviews.text: why on earth would you put a large product sticker on the face of the switch that requires major effort to remove all the residue? i bought this for a nice clean look. I guess if you like sticker residue on your eyeglasses, you'll love these switches with stickers. Not possible to leave zero star review.
customer_reviews.author: Craig B Weinheimer

customer_reviews.title: Inventory Sticker wrecks them
customer_reviews.text: These all came with a large inventory sticker covering almost the entire rocker. When removed, this leaves an uneven layer of gummy adhesive that I have not been able to successfully remove. Soap/Water doesn't work and alcohol doesn't work. I finally tried some Goof Off and that worked but dissolved the surface of the rocker itself; it looks cleaner but feels very rough. In a nutshell, these are useless as delivered in my opinion and they are too cheap to hassle with a return. Don't buy these things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Of all the stupid things to do
customer_reviews.text: Of all the stupid things to do, the vendor put permanent labels on the face of the switch that leave a mess to clean off needing goofoff or other strong solvent. Definitly will not come off with water and an ekectrical device should not be Soaked in water anyway. I am not keeping these and recommend buying them elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: freq_buyer

customer_reviews.title: Who puts a sticker on the face of a light switch!?!?
customer_reviews.text: Ran into the same label sticker issue(s) that David Dean had provided in his review--wish i just would have read them before ordering! Attaching some pictures of the sticker labels placed onto the face of the switches. Ordered the item on 2/18/16
customer_reviews.author: n8

customer_reviews.title: As used as brand new gets
customer_reviews.text: Despite being new, item arrives with scratches and sticky residue from label slapped right on the switch face. This is true for all six switches I ordered. Item is functional, but looks used. Dont waste you time - just go to the big box stores to make sure you are getting an item that actually looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: horrible. Beyond that
customer_reviews.text: My ONLY complaint is that the company that provided these had used sticky-labels on the FRONT of each switch... It took me about 3-4 minutes per switch, and overall an entire bottle of goo-gone to get all the damn adhesive off of the switches from the providers labeling....horrible. Beyond that, nice clean installs, flawless operation, and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD A.

customer_reviews.title: 10 Pack is sealed package
customer_reviews.text: Just affirming that these had no extra stickers. The 10 were in an original sealed box. They are Leviton switches.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Jeff

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT quiet and not worth the cost.  Leviton quality is not what it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: Leviton quality is not what it used to be. On the plus side, mine did not have stickers on the front of them. The BIG negative is they are listed as quiet... They are NOT quiet. They click as loud as my cheap switches. NOT worth the price. Go to the Big Box store and buy the no name brand. They cost less are UL Listed and make LESS noise than these.
customer_reviews.author: M_

customer_reviews.title: Sticker!?!??
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe they put a sticker over the entire front of the switch. When I first saw it I thought "no big deal, I'm sure it's low tack and will peel right off"... NOPE! Expect to spend 15 minutes and some goof-off to get the sticker off. Unbelievable! I wish I had read the reviews mentioning the sticker, but I really felt like ordering a Leviton switch was an item I really didn't need to check reviews on. lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: Norman C.

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap lightswitch that was Prime
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic light switch. About as basic as it comes. It is bright white, not an almond color. I replaced my dimmer with this, since my dimmer was making my speakers buzzed. I installed this and the buzzing went away. I am very happy with it and will probably buy another one for the other rooms in my house. When I purchased this, it was Amazon Prime so my shipping was fast and free. That's a bonus! If you found this helpful, please click yes. Have a great day!
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging and quality.
customer_reviews.text: As most have mentioned, the sticker over the rocker is terrible. It does not peel off without leaving residue. I tried a plastic and electronics cleaner and it was unsuccessful. You really can't use any kind of strong cleaners or it would dull the plastic. The plastic is soft, which would leave it prone to scratches. Additional, the unit feels cheap, much lighter than other rocker switches I have. Finally, if you are mixing switches that are white, it is close, but not quite the same white or as glossy as other switches. Bottom line: Just don't buy it; there are much better choices.
customer_reviews.author: JJM

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed all around!
customer_reviews.text: When I paid for a brand new 10-pack package the last thing I was expecting was to receive an opened package with all the switches dirty and or scratched. I guess quality control is not what it used to be and such damage could have been prevented by simply putting plastic protection sleeve on each switch so that they won't scratch each other during shipping. I had to return these garage sale looking switches as I’m trying to put nice looking things into my house not damaged looking things.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat these for cheap and easy.
customer_reviews.text: Not much you can say about these aside from even though they’re a detail piece, you need it to be reliable, safe and solid. Particularly for the price you can’t beat these. Each one installs in about 5 minutes and you’re good to go. Aesthetically they have a much more modern look than the traditional toggle switches and they’re way easier to hit when you’re feeling around in the dark for the switch. These make a crisp click when you flip them...they are not silent so if you want stealth switches, these aren’t them. If you want a cheap, easy rocker switch, you can’t beat these.
customer_reviews.author: brightnight

customer_reviews.title: Great basic switch
customer_reviews.text: It's a single pole light switch which takes very little effort to install. You turn of the power remove the existing switch screw the wires into the new switch then turn the power back on. I didn't have any issues like other reviews saying that there was a sticker on the face of the switch, mine was completely clean and matches my existing gray cover.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R.

customer_reviews.title: Not silent
customer_reviews.text: The switch does the job but it isn’t even close to silent. The product description is misleading. I feel like there are less expensive switches that get the same job done.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Leviton logo lettering on switch
customer_reviews.text: It appears as of June 2020, Leviton made a change to the product and added raised "LEVITON" lettering on the bottom left corner of the switch face, this is not reflected on the product listing on Amazon. In my experience, dirt and grime will build up around the raised lettering and it's difficult to clean. I bought these specifically for the clean looking surface, I will be returning these and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Emily G.

customer_reviews.title: Unwanted Stickey!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these switches and one of the switches, as other reviewers noted, had the barcode label stuck on the actual rocker switch. On other switch the barcode was stuck on the back which was fine. Removing the label from the front of the rocker switch left it looking terrible and in need of unwanted cleaning. These are good switches, but why sticking the barcode label on the seen part of the switch is beyond me.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetman56

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: I shoulda read the reviews! Not only the sticker ON the switch, the plastic frame was busted. Allow me to be clear too, it's a big sticker and it's not just stuck on lightly where one might think it'll come off if I pull it gingerly, this sticker was pressed on.... Hard. I looked at Leviton paddle switch products at 2 different stores and none had a sticker like this. Of course Amazon took it back but what a waste of time!
customer_reviews.author: VinceF

customer_reviews.title: Why are these called "Quiet switch"
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why they bothered to add "quiet switch" to the title, these certainly are not. The click it makes is actually kinda annoying and probably wouldn't have even bothered me if quiet wasn't in the title. I had specific expectations of a silent experience turning on and off all the switches in my home but the only thing these things are quieter than is perhaps yelling at Alexa to turn on the light for me.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Much better than other single pole switches I have tested
customer_reviews.text: Solid feeling and works as expected. I bought from 100% as the shipper and there were no stickers on the switch button. There was a sticker on the back, but it removed easily. I first bought BESTTEN switches because of their high rating, but when I installed one it didn't seem solid and when I would turn off the light, the switch made a strange, non solid, clicking noise. When I switched to the Leviton switch, it sounds solid throughout - turning on and off the light.
customer_reviews.author: S. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Nice switches
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 10 pack of the black single-pole and got a nice 10 pack carton of switches each in individual boxes, with no sticky labels on the switches. They were however # 5603-2E, the 3-way style, which will still work for me on the single-pole circuits so I'm not bothering with a return swap. (and I have bonus 3-ways I can use heh)
customer_reviews.author: Keru

customer_reviews.title: Sticker ruins the switch-- do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I wish I'd read the reviews first. Switch works fine, but the inventory sticker they put on the face of the switch took an hour to clean off. I didn't have any Goo Gone in the house so I used a little acetone on a q-tip to get the final bits off. Still not 100%,
customer_reviews.author: M. Tallon

customer_reviews.title: Basic Decora Switch... but..
customer_reviews.text: The switch itself was easy to install, works like a champ. But (there's always a but).. It came tossed in the box with a huge sticker right on the face which wasn't the neatest to remove at first. The sticker did come off for the most part but had to clean the residue off (using a baby wipe did the trick for me). Again, the switch itself is a-ok and worked like a champ, just the sticker on the face irked me slightly. If that doesn't bother you then just speaking of the switch, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: KwA

customer_reviews.title: Beware of who the seller is
customer_reviews.text: I have purchase these switches before, 1 week ago, and they came in nicely boxed. I really like them, so I purchase 15 more of them. This time it is from another seller. Both amazon prime, but this one is packages in a plastic bag and everything inside is all scratched up. It doesn't looked used, but how back it is scratched up might as well be used. Also the picture is mis-leading, this one does not have the light on the switch when it is on off position.
customer_reviews.author: Churk Leung

customer_reviews.title: it took nail polish remover to get the glue off and no they don't peel of easy, so i would not order from them again
customer_reviews.text: the product itself is ok Iam giving it 3 stars because the stupidity to glue labels on top of the switch is behond me,it took nail polish remover to get the glue off and no they don't peel of easy,so i would not order from them again.I have ordered form somewhere else in the past and the labels were on the plastic wrapper not directly on the switch
customer_reviews.author: MLM

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: This switch has raised “Leviton” lettering which might annoy some people. They no longer put a sticker on it. Quality seems good. It’s a standard switch so there’s not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Montag

customer_reviews.title: Great switch but has Leviton written on face
customer_reviews.text: I love Leviton decora switches. I started switching out all of the old style toggle switches in my house. Very easy to install and very quiet. Not completely quiet but doesn’t have that loud pop/click that competitor switches have. I ran out of my first 10-pack box and when I got another one the word “Leviton” was written in raised letters at the bottom of the switch. Searched high and low for switches without the name and thought these were “nameless” but I was wrong. These have the brand name written on the face as well, so I returned them. Don’t give up, there are “clean” face Leviton switches out there on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jim R

customer_reviews.title: Not one word of instructions
customer_reviews.text: I watched a video on YouTube by this manufacturer and it looked so easy. The wires fit into slots on the back. I received these and there were no instructions AT ALL. Not one word. So when I tried to hook it up - no slots. I've wasted hours of my Sunday morning, 'm very frustrated, and I have no lights in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: GoldDove

customer_reviews.title: Paddle ruins the quality perception of the switch
customer_reviews.text: Nicely constructed switch, but the black plastic paddle doesn't have a smooth surface (ripples) and doesn't have a nice, consistent glossy finish (some parts of the paddle are glossy, other parts have a satin look). Sad, since this is the part that is visible. Guessing that it is a vendor part quality control issue
customer_reviews.author: Lance Walker

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and scratched
customer_reviews.text: I had seen reviews that mentioned the switch coming with a sticker on it, but I figured that could be cleaned off easily enough so I ordered it anyway. Mistake! Aside from the sticker, the switch was also quite dirty and had several scratches on it.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer1560

customer_reviews.title: Great switch
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a bad switch in my wall. The harder part was getting the old one out. This switch, which I pried open out of curiosity, is very few parts. This fit fine. Good screws. I think the measurements how much long the copper should be are a bit off. I had to stripe my wires a bit more than in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Guy who bought it

customer_reviews.title: waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Worthless. Great idea putting stickers on the front of the rocker. Don't buy this. You'll spend more time trying to remove the residue than you will replacing 5 switches. Threw them all away. What a waste
customer_reviews.author: Ronzo

customer_reviews.title: I guess it's a fine switch, but it arrived with a label covering ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's a fine switch, but it arrived with a label covering the entire switch. 30 minutes later, and I'm still trying to get the sticky garbage off the switch. What a boneheaded way to package something. Thanks, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gustav F

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled by brand name.
customer_reviews.text: I received some cheap knockoff. Bad electrical contacts make lights flicker along with crackling electric sounds. Replaced this firehazard right away with one I got from Home Depot. Don't buy these switches on Amazon, just go to a hardware store and get it there.
customer_reviews.author: Fleiteh

customer_reviews.title: I don't know why they would put the sticker on the front pretty idiotic.
customer_reviews.text: I bought four had to throw two away they put the sticker right on the switch so it's got gummy adhesive all over the switch I tried using Goo off and it melted it. I don't know why they would put the sticker on the front pretty idiotic.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Finish is bad after trying to remove sticker glue
customer_reviews.text: Finish is bad after trying to remove sticker glue. Why put a sticker right on the surface of the product and not the sides or back where sticker goo doesn't matter. Other than that, product works well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great light switch
customer_reviews.text: This came in fast, there was not a sticker of any sort on the face of my rocker. It went in the wall and made my lights work. Worth the price and getting !
customer_reviews.author: Taitiana

customer_reviews.title: Not quiet
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this was truly a quiet switch. I have several quiet switches in my house, and to me, the switch should just be a soft thud when pressed, no click. These switches don't do that. They make a click sound. A soft click, but still a click. I chose to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold I. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy
customer_reviews.text: The switch is fine. However someone saw fit to place a sticker with the bar code across the front of the switch. I tried everything and now have 5 unusable switches. The glue from the sticker is impossible to remove without damaging the finish. Guess I should have just bought them local and supported my local businesses.
customer_reviews.author: Kathe Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Good deal. High quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these 10 packs to replace most of the switches in our house along with a couple packs of 3 ways. These levitons go well with Lutron switches like the casetas, divas, and claros. Hard to beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works but these are not quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Makes the usually snap noise when you use the switch but it works
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Very Unhappy with Receipt of 2 Switches
customer_reviews.text: One switch has 2 small chips on the face. Both switches were received with extremely sticky bar code stickers on the faces that required cleanser and much scraping and scrubbing to remove. I expect more from Amazon provided products;especially the more expensive products.
customer_reviews.author: SWP

customer_reviews.title: No cover plate
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy! My Leviton 5601-2W 15 Amp, 120/277 Volt, Decora Rocker Single-Pole AC Quiet Switch, Residential Grade, Grounding, White arrived without a cover plate. What's up with that?
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and classy update
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Came in individual boxes, in a box together. No stickers. Easy peasy. Look amazing. I wrote a better review on their 3 ways I purchased, too. All pretty switches!! Some people complained about the click but imo I haven't noticed it at all and feel like that's silly.
customer_reviews.author: SrvivlKittsn

customer_reviews.title: Glue residue. Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Switch is fine but comes with a big sticker on the switch plate. Wouldn't remove without leaving the glue residue. Did not need that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New with scratch, but works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but it came with nothing protecting the white plastic and was slightly scratched, it wasn't so bad that it wasn't usable, but who wants a brand new switch with a scratch. They should put a protective covering over the white plastic to keep it from scratching in handling/storage.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpack

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Needed 3 to install in a gang box. Just what I needed. Very easy to install. No sticker on faceplate like some other reviews. Don't hear a click. It's a light switch. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sticker on switch BAD IDEA!
customer_reviews.text: Some genius thought it was a great idea to place sticky stickers on the main part of the switch. Now the switch has leftover glue on it that needs to be cleaned off.
customer_reviews.author: M. Marion

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality switches
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in most of the house. I still have a few rooms to go. They look very nice and work smoothly. They don't have a cheap feel to them. Installation was simple and quick. Don't forget to turn off the power when doing the installation. One zap and you will remember. No cons. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from PRICE BREAKERS merchant !!!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy from PRICE BREAKERS. As you can see from pic there is dried dirt and they're all scratched up as if they are used and NOT new.
customer_reviews.author: Solar Specialist

customer_reviews.title: Warning!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work. Electrician warned about buying these products from Amazon. Now Im stuck with a bunch that don't work. Very costly mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Like to Buy

customer_reviews.title: Never go wrong with Leviton, the best.
customer_reviews.text: Almost anything Leviton is a quality part. These are no exception. All the connections you could use, strong frame, and good plug grip. More expensive but best usually is.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Cathey

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like leviton products. Very dependable. Clean look. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: DiDi

customer_reviews.title: WALL SWITCHES WORK AS EXPECTED. RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these in my house. One for a bedroom. One for the chandelier and one for the hallway light. We use them daily and they work as expected. So far no problems with these wall switches. Work as expected and recommended
customer_reviews.author: JOSE A. DUARTE

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to installs, I have bought straight from Home Improvements store which seem to get stuck easily. These are very functional and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: jorge vallin

customer_reviews.title: Buy locally - and avoid having to remove a big sticker that hides a beat-up old switch.
customer_reviews.text: Buy this at your local hardware store instead. They slapped a huge label over the front of the switch - which needed to be carefully removed, including the residual glue. This revealed a beat up old switch. What a disappointment. I ordered this from Amazon because I was ordering other switches but I won't make that mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: Granite Meg

customer_reviews.title: Each switch was covered with a sticky residue on the switch face.
customer_reviews.text: A decent price, and fast shipping, however, each switch had a large sticky label that completely covered the switch face. When the label was peeled off, each switch was left with a sticky residue which was an absolute pain to remove/rub off. That alone is enough that I would not order more.
customer_reviews.author: Hooligan

customer_reviews.title: A classic switch
customer_reviews.text: Classic rocker switch. Quiet and easy to use. Well made and easy to wire. Delivery was fast which really helps when on a deadline.
customer_reviews.author: Energyguy

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: As you can see, these came new in box in great condition. These are of much higher quality than the ones that were previously installed in my home and installation was simple. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: oldschool

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased nearly 2 dozen and replaced the entire house...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great switches!
customer_reviews.text: These are very good switches. We installed them in the kitchen for the light above the sink and for the disposal. 👌 Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Mason

customer_reviews.title: took 2 minutes to install and took 21 minutes to ...
customer_reviews.text: took 2 minutes to install and took 21 minutes to clean the goo from the sticker off. Why in the world would you A. use the the stickiest stickers of your inventory management and B. why would you put it right on the switch?!?!?!?!?!?! The switch is cheap but it works.
customer_reviews.author: aaronslittle

customer_reviews.title: Good standard switch
customer_reviews.text: Standard switches. Same as you can get anywhere. They do work and price here beat big box places
customer_reviews.author: David Plokhooy

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Store displays, but could of been shipped alot better. As soon as I picked up the package I could hear them rattling around. Most had sticky crap on the switch face.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Color advisory
customer_reviews.text: There are various colors to chose from. I picked the wrong one. Some purchases are just worth the trip to the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mine are not silent...
customer_reviews.text: Look nice, but not silent. I have no issue keeping them but description said silent. Other than that I’ve installed 2 and work fine so far
customer_reviews.author: Tony Palmieri

customer_reviews.title: switches
customer_reviews.text: Great product MADE IN USA. As a former electrical device manufacturer employee thank you making it here. I will pay more for MADE IN USA. THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: James Carter

customer_reviews.title: No stickers on switches
customer_reviews.text: These (Leviton 5601-2WM 15 Amp) came 10 per sealed box and provide both a push-in and screw-down wire connection. Solid toggle with audible click. Exactly as my current switches.
customer_reviews.author: MagnoliaTexas

customer_reviews.title: Buy only genuine Leviton or you'll be sorry
customer_reviews.text: There are cheaper brands of this switch, but you shouldn't buy them. Leviton works smoother and lasts longer than the knock-offs. If you want to save money, buy them in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Jack—tech geek extraordinaire

customer_reviews.title: Leviton quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: They're old and somewhat outdated, but are in great shape and work as expected. The color is more accurately described as antique white.
customer_reviews.author: YOUR PUBLIC NAME

customer_reviews.title: have bad eyesight, or have monstrously large fingers
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it’s a light switch designed for people who wear gloves 24x7, have bad eyesight, or have monstrously large fingers. No, it doesn’t come in Red. :)
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Huge sticker ruined it
customer_reviews.text: Came with an Amazon sticker stuck on the switch...couldn't remove it and not worth the hassle of putting goo gone on there, scrubbing, and trying not to get the insides wet....
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Sticker still there
customer_reviews.text: It’s true. The sticker is right on the front and it takes some time to get the adhesive off. Buy a different switch
customer_reviews.author: Kcs seattle

customer_reviews.title: not quiet switches as described
customer_reviews.text: These are not quiet switches as its written in the description. If i had known they wouldn't be the quiet switches as described, then I would have saved 25% and purchased them at the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Doug deJonge

customer_reviews.title: These are great switches at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These are great switches at a great price. I had most of them without the sticker directly on the switch but one or two came with the sticker right on the switch leaving the sticky residue all over. A little Goo Gone cleaned it right up in a few seconds so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Switches things on, then off again!
customer_reviews.text: Fans or lights, this switch doesn't really care. It will indeed allow you to switch things on and then off again as needed. Reasonably easy to install into the wall with minimal swearing involved. Depending on the gauge of wire used in your house, you can also use the 'thread in' sockets on the back instead of the more cumbersome screws. Either way it works as expected, and looks awesome afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: P. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Slick switches
customer_reviews.text: Slowly replacing the dated and dirty toggle switches in my house with these.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Way to Update Decor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased new switches and plates to update the decor of my home. This switch was very easy to wire and looks very tasteful. The switch is quite solid and seems to hold up well to normal usage. I would recommend that those installing be very careful to insure the switch is perfectly straight and even. If not, it will be very pronounced with the larger surface area.
customer_reviews.author: malom

customer_reviews.title: Leviton is a brand of wiring devices that has been ...
customer_reviews.text: Leviton is a brand of wiring devices that has been around for more years than I have been in the electrical industry and that is 55 years. they have products you can depend on
customer_reviews.author: Spock

customer_reviews.title: They turn the lights off so we'll you can hear it!
customer_reviews.text: Not silent at all... These are so loud when I click them on and off that my neighbor thought gun shots were firing and called the police. Extremely useful for Morse code situations. I belive these switches were the loud ones used to train Pavlov's dogs. So loud they woke up my fish.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah DesJardin

customer_reviews.title: Not silent
customer_reviews.text: Not silent, deceptive title. The box they arrive in clearly doesn’t state anything about being silent either. Clearly they are lying to folks in order to make more sales. Amazon ought to do something about this.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Cheap UPC stickers on the face of the switch leaves ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap UPC stickers on the face of the switch leaves lots of glue that is difficult to remove without damaging the finish on the switch. Not worth having to try and remove the glue so I returned and purchased product from Ace hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Extras to be on hand as needed
customer_reviews.text: Have had a couple switches fail and these will be spares already used 1 and it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Aurorian

customer_reviews.title: Great looking work working switch
customer_reviews.text: Looks so much better than the old style light switches.
customer_reviews.author: Allan M. Colby

customer_reviews.title: Great switch from a great brand
customer_reviews.text: Excellent switch. Does exactly what I need and mat hes my current switches.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: It's coo
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my older style switches and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Not quiet! Has big loud click with every action. Also, 3 of the 4 purchased came with a sticker on top of the switch, so I had to spend time scrubbing/rubbing the sticker residue of th switches. Quite a waste of time. Overall, no better than and no savings over the big box store switches. Will buy something different next time.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quiet. Doubles and triple gang boxes are a bit difficult to line up. Be sure not to tighten down switch as you normally would.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Wifey

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 but only received 1
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars if I received what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Lisbeth22

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing, not silent
customer_reviews.text: This was easy enough to install. The switch is not very silent or quiet. You can hear a distinct clicking sound when you turn a light on and off. I didn't notice until I read the product description and other reviews stating how this item was supposed to be quiet, but is not.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It matches the black Gang Wall Plates I purchase. The old one was constantly in use as it operate the garbage disposal and eventually lost its luster!
customer_reviews.author: Dr.K

customer_reviews.title: One of the best rockers I have found.
customer_reviews.text: Selected Leviton and purchased several items to redecorate in the lower level. Great neutral. Easy rocker.
customer_reviews.author: 2 in College

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: This switch looks, moves, & installs as expected. The white is a nice true white unlike some others I have purchased before.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Sticky label on the switch surface
customer_reviews.text: Why would you put the label sticker directly on the switch surface???! This left all the sticky adhesive on it and ridiculously hard to clean. Will be shipping this back.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have never installed light switches or outlets before. This is super easy to use and it tells you how to as well. Never had an issue
customer_reviews.author: Meike Emmrich

customer_reviews.title: I saw some other comments about the adhesive being terrible to remove
customer_reviews.text: I saw some other comments about the adhesive being terrible to remove. I VERY slowly pulled off the sticker, then wiped gently with Goof Off, zero residue remains. Trick is pulling off the label slow so the adhesive has time to release from the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Randy V

customer_reviews.title: Good Switch
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace cheap switch in travel trailer. Works like it should.
customer_reviews.author: JAWs

customer_reviews.title: Durable, nice switch
customer_reviews.text: These have been holding up well after several months. Easy to install and attractive. Nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: R Joe

customer_reviews.title: NOT SATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: Not quiet clicks in ON?OFF as described. Not satisfied and returned back. NOT RECOMMENDED!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price on this name brand switch
customer_reviews.text: Have not yet installed, but I have full confidence this will be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robinson

product_meta.title: Leviton 5601-2W 15 Amp, 120/277 Volt, Decora Rocker Single-Pole AC Quiet Switch, Residential Grade, Grounding, White
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Pack| Color:White15A 120/277V DEC SP SW WHITE

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Featuring a look and feel that qualify them as modern classics, Decora (R) brand designer Rocker Switches add so much at a modest cost that no home should be without them. Their sleek simplicity and smooth, quiet operation stem from quality materials fitted to tight tolerances and finished with great care, ensuring years of trouble-free service. Easy to wire, they work with tungsten, fluorescent and resistive loads. Legendary Decora® Designer Rocker Switches come in a variety of colors to harmonize with any décor. Their sturdy construction and dependable performance are everything you'd expect from the pre-eminent switch maker. 15 Amp, 120/277 Volt, Decora Rocker Single-Pole AC Quiet Switch, Residential Grade, Grounding, White. Decora is a registered trademark of Leviton Mfg. Co., Inc.
feature_bullets: Switch frame shields against dust and prevents rocker binding
Terminal screws accept up to No. 12 AGW and Quickwire push-in terminals accept No. 14 AWG solid copper wire only
Sturdy construction for long service life
Full-rated current capacity with tungsten, fluorescent or resistive loads. Motor capacity is 80% of switch rating
